MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG11 postcode area of Lockerbie. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.00am to safely carry out repairs to the overhead line equipment at edge farm carrutherstoun and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:28am on Wednesday, 18 November 2020
